alert.note: Alert for Deuel; Keith (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 17 at 11:24AM CDT until June 20 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in North Platte NE has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Nebraska... South Platte River near Roscoe affecting Deuel and Keith Counties. .Runoff from rainfall in Colorado has led to elevated river levels along the South Platte River in southwestern Nebraska. River levels are expected to approach minor flood stage at Roscoe Sunday morning and are forecast to fall below flood stage Monday morning. For the South Platte River...including Roscoe...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY MORNING TO TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...South Platte River near Roscoe. * WHEN...From Sunday morning to Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 9.0 feet, Flood Stage. Minor flooding of agricultural land along the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:30 AM MDT Saturday the stage was 8.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above the flood stage of 9.0 feet tomorrow morning to a crest of 9.1 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage Monday morning. - Flood stage is 9.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 9.2 feet on 06/10/2014. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Sunday morning at 1030 AM MDT.
